SELECT b.BOM_ID, b.PRODUCT_ID, fp.PRODUCT_NM, fp.PRODUCT_SPEC , i.LOT_SIZE , m.MATERIAL_CLASSIFICATION, b.MATERIAL_ID, m.MATERIAL_NM , b.QUANTITY_UNITS, b.BOM_PROD_QUANTITY FROM BOM b, FINISHED_PRODUCT fp, MATERIAL m, INSTRUCTION i WHERE b.PRODUCT_ID = fp.PRODUCT_ID AND b.MATERIAL_ID = m.MATERIAL_ID AND b.LOT_ID = i.LOT_ID
AND fp.PRODUCT_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchProdNm} || '%'
AND fp.searchProdDiv LIKE '%' || #{searchProdDiv} || '%'
AND m.searchMatNm LIKE '%' || #{searchMatNm} || '%'
ORDER BY b.BOM_ID, b.PRODUCT_ID, m.MATERIAL_CLASSIFICATION
